titleStmt.title: Nautical Lexicon Project Standoff Markup for Subject Index

publicationStmt.p: Publication Information - multilingual glossary of nautical terms

sourceDesc.p: This project is based on 3x5 index cards of glossary information and notes which have been transcribed
